shelters.name: Paws of Love Shelter
shelters.description: Paws of Love Shelter is dedicated to rescuing and rehoming abandoned and neglected pets. Our mission is to provide compassionate care and find loving homes for all animals in need.

shelters.name: Whisker Haven Rescue
shelters.description: Whisker Haven Rescue is committed to saving cats and kittens from high-kill shelters and dangerous situations. We provide medical care, spaying/neutering, and find loving homes for our feline friends.

shelters.name: Happy Tails Sanctuary
shelters.description: Happy Tails Sanctuary provides a safe haven for senior and special needs dogs. Our sanctuary offers comfort, medical care, and a forever home for dogs who have been abandoned or are facing euthanasia.
